tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cost_savings_analysis (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
    miles_per_gallon DECIMAL(10,2),
    electricity_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    gasoline_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    city_mileage DECIMAL(10,2),
    highway_mileage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE electric_vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(100),
    model_year INT,
    electric_range_miles FLOAT,
    cost_per_mile DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_powered_vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(100),
    model_year INT,
    gas_mileage_mpg INT,
    fuel_cost_per_gallon DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
   vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
   fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
   cost_per_mile DECIMAL(10, 2),
   emissions_per_mile DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
   trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   distance_traveled DECIMAL(10, 2),
   trip_duration INTERVAL,
   trip_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
   trip_emissions DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE savings (
   savings_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   trip_id INT,
   savings_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE electric_vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    battery_capacity DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_powered_vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    fuel_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cost_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    total_cost DECIMAL(8,2),
    savings DECIMAL(8,2),
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE cost_savings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type TEXT,
    fuel_type TEXT,
    miles_driven DECIMAL,
    cost_saved DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_details (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make TEXT,
    vehicle_model TEXT,
    year INT,
    vehicle_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    electric_consumption DECIMAL,
    fuel_consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE mileage_history (
    mileage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    yearly_mileage DECIMAL,
    last_service_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_costs (
    cost_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL,
    maintenance_date DATE
)
